ooC: Anachronox, uhh, guessed about the storage bay. He still has a 
some of Firedrill's memories though that's how he knew about the base 
being a ship. Were Anachronox and Belthassan heading towards the 
storage bay originally?
ooC: The bot helping Gesper is called Crossroads, not Crotale. =)

-- Anachronox / Crossroads / Pacifix --

Anachronox nods, "Gesper, where is he now? What exactly does it mean 
to be a 'techno-organic'? Harvesting mission... what does that mean?"

He nods and follows Belthassan to the storage bay. 

"Daemos... interesting." He murmurs as they head to the rest of the 
crew.

----------------------------

'Hmmm' thinks Pacifix, 'Why are so many unfortunate accidents 
happening to we the autobots now...'

"Daemos. From the sounds of it, it was likely an accident. I would 
like to speak to .. Anachronox before deciding whether or not we can 
bring him back." Pacifix says in a resigned voice. "I'll be heading 
over soon."

----------------------------

Crossroads nods, "Sure." He exits the room, "Follow me." He heads to 
the control room.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Belthassan is surprised that Anachronox actually knows this is a 
ship 
> and that he knows the location of the storage bay.
> 
> Belthassan: Yes the storage bays are that way. The Shadow Destiny 
has 
> been built by Gesper, my younger brother. It is a techno-organic, 
with 
> a format similar to yours and mine. All of us, Tripredacus, are 
> techno-organics. We have been sent on Earth for a harvesting 
mission.
> 
> He heads to the storage bay.
> 
> Belthassan: I will introduce you first to the other members of the 
> team before I present Daemos. He is our commander.
> 
> -----------------------------
> 
> Daemos: Oh, we did find Firedrill. However, he is not the same 
person 
> anymore. Something we did not anticipate happened in the Renewal 
> Chamber. Usually, it heals techno-organics. What I believe happened 
is 
> that the Chamber reformatted him to fit the healing process. He now 
> calls himself Anachronox and has pledged alligence to my group. I 
did 
> not wish this to happen. I am sorry about what happened, and I hope 
> you can find some forgiveness in you. If we find any solutions, we 
> will talk with you about it.
> 
> -----------------------------
> 
> Gesper: Sure thing Crotale. I'd like to talk with Pacifix now.
